instruction.value: DAY 1 of 21. Administer by direct injection over 1 to 2 minutes.
DAY 1 of 21. Administer dose diluted in 0.9% sodium chloride 100 mL over 15 minutes.

Population.value: Fluorouracil, Epirubicin, Cyclophosphamide (FEC) followed by DOCEtaxel. Breast Cancer (NEOADJUVANT Treatment).
Fluorouracil, Epirubicin, Cyclophosphamide (FEC) followed by DOCEtaxel & Trastuzumab

AdditionalNotes.value: If ANC is greater than or equal to 1.5 AND Plts are greater than or equal to 100 x 109/L: Give as ordered. If ANC is less than 1.5 OR Plts are less than 100 x 109/L: Delay 1 week.
